name: itsme-fashion-mvp
description: It's Me Fashion - Monorepo with Lit + Vite + Firebase

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:services && npm run build:root && npm run build:app && npm run build:copy-pkg
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @itsme/shared-utils && npm run build -w @itsme/design-system
scripts.build:services: npm run build -w @itsme/service-catalog && npm run build -w @itsme/service-identity && npm run build -w @itsme/service-cart && npm run build -w @itsme/service-payments && npm run build -w @itsme/service-delivery && npm run build -w @itsme/service-wishlist
scripts.build:copy-pkg: for service in cart catalog delivery identity payments wishList; do cp src/services/$service/package.json lib/services/$service/package.json 2>/dev/null || true; done
